div.head: 火灼爛瘡
div.div: festering sores following scorching by fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: festering sores following scorching by fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29: 千金墮火灼爛瘡 方，榆白皮熟嚼封之，瘥 , “Recipe worth thousands in gold for festering sores following scorching by fire : yu bai pi is to be thoroughly boiled, then chewed and used to cover [the sores]. This brings the cure”.
